mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN #{mid} IN (SELECT mana_id FROM manager) THEN '관리자' WHEN #{mid} IN (SELECT tea_id FROM teacher) THEN '강사' WHEN #{mid} IN (SELECT stu_id FROM student) THEN '학생' ELSE '해당 없음' END "role" from dual

select (select count(*) from student where to_char(regist_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')) "COUNT_0" , (select count(*) from student where to_char(regist_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate-1,'yyyy-mm-dd')) "COUNT_1" , (select count(*) from student where to_char(regist_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate-2,'yyyy-mm-dd')) "COUNT_2" , (select count(*) from student where to_char(regist_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate-3,'yyyy-mm-dd')) "COUNT_3" , (select count(*) from student where to_char(regist_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate-4,'yyyy-mm-dd')) "COUNT_4" , (select count(*) from student where to_char(regist_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate-5,'yyyy-mm-dd')) "COUNT_5" , (select count(*) from student where to_char(regist_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate-6,'yyyy-mm-dd')) "COUNT_6" from dual

SELECT all_tea_cnt, dayoff_tea_cnt, all_tea_cnt - dayoff_tea_cnt AS work_tea_cnt FROM ( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM teacher) AS all_tea_cnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM teacher t WHERE t.tea_id = ( SELECT td.tea_id FROM tea_dayoff td WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd')) BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(dayoff_start,'yyyymmdd')) AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(dayoff_end,'yyyymmdd')) ) ) AS dayoff_tea_cnt FROM dual )

SELECT (select count(*) from class) "all_class_cnt" ,(select count(*) FROM class WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd')) BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(class_start_date,'yyyymmdd')) AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(class_end_date,'yyyymmdd'))) "due_class_cnt" ,(select count(*) FROM class WHERE
TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd')) < TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(class_start_date,'yyyymmdd'))) "yet_class_cnt" ,(select count(*) FROM class WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd')) > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(class_end_date,'yyyymmdd'))) "end_class_cnt"
from dual

select (select stu_name from student s where df.stu_id = s.stu_id) "who_name" ,to_char(application_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') "regist_date" ,payment_status "status" ,dayoff_kind "dayoff_kind" from dayoff df union all select (select tea_name from teacher t where df.tea_id = t.tea_id) ,to_char(application_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') ,payment_status ,tea_dayoff_kind from tea_dayoff df
